def lib.util.irccommanddispatcher.IRCCommandDispatcher.send_command_and_wait (   self,
  cmd,
  success_codes = None,
  failure_codes = None,
  timeout = 60 
)

Send a command and block execution until a response code is seen.

Parameters:
cmd Raw command to send
success_codes Array of server return codes that signal a success
failure_codes Array of server return codes that signal failure
timeout Maximum time in seconds to wait for a return code
